meanings.definition: Add color to (a black-and-white photograph or movie).
meanings.sent1: She colorized the old photo of her grandparents.
meanings.sent2: The artist colorized the classic movie to bring it to life.
meanings.sent3: The magician colorized the black-and-white rabbit, making it look even more magical.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter colorized the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sun colorized the sky with shades of pink and orange during the sunset.

meanings.sent1: He colorized the drawing of a rainbow.
meanings.sent2: The flowers colorized the garden with their vibrant hues.
meanings.sent3: The chef colorized the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: Her words colorized his world, making it more beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The paintbrush colorized the canvas, turning it into a masterpiece.
